author: Drago prime
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Claude AI cog! To get started, set your API key with `[p]claude setapikey YOUR_API_KEY` (preferably in DMs). Then enable Claude in a channel with `[p]claude addchannel #channel-name`.
name: ClaudeAI
short: Integrates Claude AI by Anthropic with your Discord server
description: Allows Claude AI to respond to messages in designated channels. Includes commands for configuration and direct interaction.
